quote: Character is power; it makes friends, draws patronage and support and opens the way to wealth, honor and happiness.
As he was valiant, I honor him. But as he was ambitious, I slew him.
Ability without honor is useless.
The post of honor is a private station.
A man's vanity tells him what is honor, a man's conscience what is justice.
Act well your part; there all honor lies.
All great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.
An honor is not diminished for being shared.
Character is power; it makes friends, draws patronage and support and opens the way to wealth, honor and happiness.
As he was valiant, I honor him. But as he was ambitious, I slew him.
Ability without honor is useless.
The post of honor is a private station.
A man's vanity tells him what is honor, a man's conscience what is justice.
Act well your part; there all honor lies.
All great things are simple, and many can be expressed in a single word: freedom, justice, honor, duty, mercy, hope.
An honor is not diminished for being shared.
As to honor - you know - it's a very fine mediaeval inheritance which women never got hold of. It wasn't theirs.
Be noble minded! Our own heart, and not other men's opinions of us, forms our true honor.
Better to die ten thousand deaths than wound my honor.
Death most resembles a prophet who is without honor in his own land or a poet who is a stranger among his people.
Envy feeds on the living, after death it rests, then the honor of a man protects him.
Fame is something that must be won. Honor is something that must not be lost.
Fondly we think we honor merit then, When we but praise ourselves in other men.
Funeral pomp is more for the vanity of the living than for the honor of the dead.
Good nature is worth more than knowledge, more than money, more than honor, to the persons who possess it.
Great eagerness in the pursuit of wealth, pleasure, or honor, cannot exist without sin.
He that hath a trade hath an estate; he that hath a calling hath an office of profit and honor.
He who has lost honor can lose nothing more.
Honesty is the best policy. If I lose mine honor, I lose myself.
Honor and shame from no condition rise; Act well your part, there all the honor lies.
Honor has not to be won; it must only not be lost.
Honor is like an island, rugged and without a beach; once we have left it, we can never return.
Honor is not the exclusive property of any political party.
Honor is simply the morality of superior men.
Honor is simply the morality of superior men.
Honor is the moral conscience of the great.
Honor is the reward of virtue.
Honor is unstable and seldom the same; for she feeds upon opinion, and is as fickle as her food.
Honor lies in honest toil.
Honor sinks where commerce long prevails.
Honor the ocean of love.
Honor your commitments with integrity.
I have deserved neither so much honor or so much disgrace.
I have learned not to worry about love; but to honor its coming with all my heart.
I love the name of honor, more than I fear death.
I would prefer even to fail with honor than win by cheating.
If honor were profitable, everybody would be honorable.
If it be a sin to covet honor I am the most offending soul alive.
It is in the character of very few men to honor without envy a friend who has prospered.
It is unthinkable for a Frenchman to arrive at middle age without having syphilis and the Cross of the Legion of Honor.
Leadership to me means duty, honor, country. It means character, and it means listening from time to time.
Let honor be to us as strong an obligation as necessity is to others.
Life every man holds dear; but the dear man holds honor far more precious dear than life.
Masculinity is not something given to you, but something you gain. And you gain it by winning small battles with honor.
Meditation is the life of the soul: Action, the soul of meditation. and honor the reward of action.
Next to theology I give music the highest place of honor.
No amount of ability is of the slightest avail without honor.
No one ever lost his honor, except he who had it not.
No person was ever honored for what he received. Honor has been the reward for what he gave.
Our own heart, and not other men's opinion, forms our true honor.
Pay no attention to what the critics say... Remember, a statue has never been set up in honor of a critic!
Purity is the feminine, truth the masculine of honor.
Rather fail with honor than succeed by fraud.
Send danger from the east unto the west, so honor cross it from the north to south.
Show me the man you honor, and I will know what kind of man you are.
The cross of the Legion of Honor has been conferred on me. However, few escape that distinction.
The effect of violent dislike between groups has always created an indifference to the welfare and honor of the state.
The fiery trials through which we pass will light us down in honor or dishonor to the latest generation.
The greatest honor history can bestow is that of peacemaker.
The honor of the conquest is rated by the difficulty.
The jingling of the guinea helps the hurt that Honor feels.
The law often permits what honor prohibits.
The leader who exercises power with honor will work from the inside out, starting with himself.
The louder he talked of his honor, the faster we counted our spoons.
The nation's honor is dearer than the nation's comfort; yes, than the nation's life itself.
There are three classes of men; lovers of wisdom, lovers of honor, and lovers of gain.
There could be no honor in a sure success, but much might be wrested from a sure defeat.
There has never been a statue erected to honor a critic.
Those who give hoping to be rewarded with honor are not giving, they are bargaining.
To honor him whom we have made is far from honoring him that hath made us..
To the Master's honor all must turn, each in its track, without a sound, forever tracing Newton's ground.
To those whose God is honor; only disgrace is a sin.
War, he sung, is toil and trouble; Honor but an empty bubble.
We treat our people like royalty. If you honor and serve the people who work for you, they will honor and serve you.
Wealth lost is something lost, honor lost is something lost: Courage lost all is lost.
When faith is lost, when honor dies, the man is dead.
When there is a lack of honor in government, the morals of the whole people are poisoned.
Without money honor is merely a disease.
Woman's honor is nice as ermine; it will not bear a soil.
Worthless is the nation that does not gladly stake its all on its honor.
You will never do anything in this world without courage. It is the greatest quality of the mind next to honor.
Why should honor outlive honestly?
